name: Atelier Escha & Logy: Alchemists of the Dusk Sky DX
name_original: Atelier Escha & Logy: Alchemists of the Dusk Sky DX
description:
Atelier Escha & Logy is the sequel to Atelier Ayesha. Building upon the mythos introduced in Ayesha,
this game features an even more mysterious atmosphere and supernatural environments in order to create a strong sense of the fantastic.

Choose between two heroes, who will have different perspectives on events in the game, as well as having unique personal events throughout. This addition, along with a vastly improved combat system and a more in-depth, yet approachable, synthesis system, makes this game is a worthy successor to the Atelier name for players both new and old. Behold the beginning of a new era for the series in Atelier Escha & Logy!
